title: Things to Do | Utopia of the Seas | Royal Caribbean Cruises
text: play harder Here, you can go all in and all out. New chart-topping showstoppers blow your mind on stage, ice, water and air. And you never know what surprises await you at the nearest watering hole. Hang on to the edge of your seat as all-star high divers perform hair-raising acrobatic dives into the deepest pool at sea at AquaTheater. Catch spectacular displays of ice-skating artistry with mesmerizing spins, lifts and jumps by world-class professional figure skaters. And give a standing ovation to dazzling Broadway-style musicals that you can’t stop singing along to. Laid back paradise is a vibe at the Pesky Parrot℠. This exotic new bar on the Royal Promenade is the perfect tropical spot to kick off your getaway with fruit-based concoctions made with rum, tequila or gin, and frozen drinks that flow like island waterfalls to keep you coming back, again and again.
